title: The Reckoning
description: Luc, a demon Mare, and Joelle, the sassy woman he started out tormenting only to fall in love with, must travel to hell to save Joelle from a fate worse than death -- eternal damnation. But when they arrive, they’ll be damned if they’re putting up with what they find.Betrayal, tricks, and a twist of fate have them questioning reality and their love for each other. Will either of them survive?
author: Torri Heat
